Token.Abstract: The delegate of a TextChatView object must adopt the TextChatViewDelegate protocol. Optional methods of the protocol allow the delegate to notify the connectivity.
Tells the delegate the text chat view finishes sending message with or without error

Parameter.Name: textChatView
Parameter.Abstract: The text chat view object informing the delegate of this impending event.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object that text chat view is going to use when encountering an issue

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the text chat view finishes sending message with or without error

Parameter.Name: textChatView
Parameter.Abstract: The text chat view object informing the delegate of this impending event.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the text chat view has established a text chat connection with or without error

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The text chat view object informing the delegate of this impending event.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the text chat view has stopped a text chat connection with or without error

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The text chat view object informing the delegate of this impending event.
